#Text=Sharon ( Massachusetts )
#Text=Sharon is a town in Massachusetts .
#Text=By plane
#Text=T.F. Green
#Text=Airport
#Text=in Warwick ( Rhode Island ) and Logan International Airport in Boston .
#Text=By train
#Text=The local regional rail system is the MBTA Commuter Rail .
#Text=Sharon 's stop lies between Mansfield and Stoughton and is part of the Providence/Stoughton line .
#Text=Located on 1 Upland Road down the street from the center of town .
#Text=If you are coming from Providence , the Commuter rail is significantly cheaper ( $ 7.75 versus $ 16 ) .
#Text=See
#Text=Statue of Deborah Sampson , 11 North Main Street ( located in front of Sharon Public Library ) .
#Text=Home of Deborah Sampson . an American heroine who impersonated a man in order to serve in the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Alice ’s Mandarin Taste , Will be found on 37 Pond Street ( located in the Center of Sharon , walking distance from the High School and Pizzagando . ) , ☏ +1 781-784- 7377 .
#Text=Open 364 days a year ( only closed on Thanksgiving ) . is an Szechuan and Mandarin Cuisine restaurant with a soothing atmosphere and intricate menu selection .

#Text=Sometimes referred to as “ Alice ’s ” by the locals for short ; Alice is likely to be working when you go there and is the main benefactor to achieving the friendly environment as she is very talkative .
#Text=Mandarin
#Text=Taste has been open for over two decades and has been voted number one for quality food and unparalleled customer service .
#Text=Coriander
#Text=Bistro
#Text=is known for it ’s Indian and Nepali food .
#Text=A bit on the pricey side , Coriander is an exotic restaurant best suited for adults seeking foreign foods .
#Text=With a large menu full of hard to pronounce dishes , Coriander features some of the finest Indian and Nepali cuisine to be had in the area .
#Text=Located in the center of town , Coriander Bistro thrives with a unique menu and excellent customer service .
#Text=The address is 5 Post Office Square .
#Text=Crescent Ridge Dairy ( Cridge ) is the most popular ice cream shop in town during the Summer and Spring seasons .
#Text=Customers enjoy the weather and dine outside as Crescent Ridge features multiple windows to order from .
#Text=Often referred to as “ Cridge ” for short by locals , the ice cream and milkshakes are second to none .
#Text=The large parking lot is frequently filled by townies , little league teams , and go byers during the warm weather and is seemingly is a desolate wasteland during the Winter and Fall seasons .

#Text=With domestic dairy products being served and delivered year round to locals about town , the large field behind Cridge is where the cows roam free and are often a tourist attraction for it ’s customers .
#Text=355 Bay Road .
#Text=French Memories is a cafe located in the center of Sharon .
#Text=Formerly a Starbucks Cafe , French Memories features the serene atmosphere and upscale menu of a typical independent coffee shop .
#Text=Offering free wifi and a comfortable work or study area , French Memories serves many students and adults alike .
#Text=Halfway between the Sharon High School and Sharon Train Station ( Stoughton Providence Line ) , a diverse group of people can be found on a typical weekday .
#Text=French Memories also is a small venue for local artists to perform at Open Mic ceremonies .
#Text=French Memories has been serving coffee and pastries for several years now and will continue to thrive due to its phenomenal service and atmosphere .
#Text=5 Post Office Square .
#Text=Pizzagando is conveniently located in the center of Sharon .
#Text=Having an excellent reputation throughout town , Pizzagando offers a wide variety of foods to many locals of Sharon and surrounding towns .
#Text=Pizzagando can be found down the street from Sharon High School .
#Text=With an extensive menu , an array of dishes , and a convenient location , Pizzagando has asserted itself as Sharon ’s main pizza joint .
#Text=1 Pond Street Sharon , Massachusetts 02067 .
#Text=Pizza Market , located at 376 South Main Street , is a premiere pizza and Greek cuisine walk in restaurant .
#Text=Though Pizzagando is it ’s main competitor , Pizza Market offers a unique selection of specialty pizzas and subs .
#Text=Perhaps the main reason why it thrives despite Pizzagando ’s success is it ’s location on the opposite end of town .
#Text=Run by a Greek family , Pizza Market is a friendly environment and hang out spot for local kids .
#Text=Sichuan Gourmet has ostensibly become the premiere Chinese restaurant of Sharon .
#Text=Located in the Heights Plaza a few doors down from Pizza Market .
#Text=Offering a suitable menu for any Chinese food seeker , Sichuan Gourmet contends with the Chinatown about ten minutes down the road in Stoughton .
#Text=A fairly new restaurant means a recently remodeled and refurnished dining area .
#Text=Sichuan Gourmet is likely to stick around for years to come due to its excellent customer service and appetizing menu .
#Text=338 South Main Street .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Holiday Inn Express , 395 Old Post Rd , ☏ +1781 784-1000 .
